content.msg: With the dream of providing quality grains supply, the late Mr. Kantilal Bora started his journey in wholesale business 50 years ago.

His guidance & vision helps Mr. Sunilkumar Bora, lead our company to the top of its segment. We are proudly reaching new heights everyday with the trust & support of our beloved clients and well wishers.
We have recently inaugurated our company at Two more locations in last two years.

msg.msg: We aim to provide the highest quality, adulteration free grains at reasonable prices and to achieve & maintain the top most position in wholesale market.
To build the trust & security within our customers & society with supply of quality grains to keep our brand respected in market.

Isn’t it great to check out the quality of the grain, you are going to buy? That’s why we have a wide range of samples available for our customers. Customers can choose the grains from the samples they require and the same is available in the packaging starting from 10 KG to 50 KG.
We are concerned with the quality, shipping, processing, and storage of the grains and we store our products in a clean & hygienic places.
We proudly offer direct sales of packaged and bulk grains. With decades of experience in sourcing only the finest grains, you can be assured that every ingredient is having the highest quality.
Customer satisfaction is our motto & we keep it intact in all circumstances, if the delivered product is damaged then, we make sure to replace it within a certain period of time.

details.msg: We have Silver type in Basmati Steam brand. We have different variations in it like Silver Pearl, Silver Star, Silver Gold, Silver Regular, Silver Platinum with 10 KG packing variety.
We have Rizwan type in Basmati Steam brand. We have different variations in it like Rizwan Delight, Rizwan Everyday, Rizwan Mini Mogra, Rizwan Regular with 10 KG packing variety.

We have Ruchi Bhog type in Basmati Steam brand. We have different variations in it like Ruchi Bhog Best, Ruchi Bhog Dubar, Ruchi Bhog Gold Biryani, Ruchi Bhog Hyderabadi, Ruchi Bhog Mughlai, Ruchi Bhog Super Mogra, Ruchi Bhog Tini with 10 KG packing variety.

We have Shahabzada type in Basmati Steam brand. We have different variations in it like Shahabzada Super Mogra, Shahabzada Mini Dubar, Shahabzada Premium, Shahabzada Dubar, Shahabzada Special with 10 KG packing variety.
We have Al Abrar type in Basmati Steam brand. We have Al Abrar Tini variations in itin 10 KG packing

Likewise we have different types in Basmati Steam brand as Grand India in 20 KG Packing, Khushiyon Ke Pal in 20 KG Packing, Swagat Super in 20 KG Packing,00aarif 40 KG Packing, Badhai Basmati in 25 KG Packing
